full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Janitorial Services for RCMP Carnduff Detachment
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01028819

**Issued on:** March 3, 2023
**Deadline for Submissions:** April 3, 2023, at 4:00 PM local time

**Summary:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites Tenders for the provision of Janitorial Services for the RCMP Carnduff Detachment in Saskatchewan. The contract period will be two years, with an optional three-year extension.

**Description:**
The RCMP requires labor, materials, equipment, transportation, and daily site supervision to provide janitorial services in accordance with the Invitation to Tender and Annex A - Janitorial Services. Cleaning will be required twice weekly.

**Security Requirements:**
This solicitation contains a security requirement. A site visit is being offered; please refer to the Invitation to Tender for additional details.

**Selection Criteria:**
A bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

**Submission Requirements:**
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Invitation to Tender. Refer to the attached Tender Documents for further information.

**Contact Information:**
To contact the solicitation team, please reach out to:
Debbie McPherson
